about_the_game:
Welcome to a bone-chilling horror experience set a world inspired by the iconic Steamboat Willie cartoon and Slender: the eight pages. You are a daring cargo collector, navigating through an eerie forest, collecting valuable cargo while desperately avoiding the nightmarish duo, Mickey and Minnie.

Once beloved characters, Mickey and Minnie have transformed into strange entities, their hollow eyes and eerie smiles haunting your every move.

Your objective is simple: Collect valuable cargo scattered throughout the forest and return them to the dock inside a timeframe, while trying to not get caught.

Be aware!
The game uses you microphone, so keep quiet and everything should be alright.

The base game was made as a small project for fun in about a week, with further updates added afterwards to improve on the gameplay.

Your objective is simple: Collect valuable cargo scattered throughout the forest and return them to the dock inside a timeframe, while trying to not get caught.

Be aware!
The game uses you microphone, so keep quiet and everything should be alright.

name: The Rubberhose Forest

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB or AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

You are a daring cargo collector, navigating through an eerie forest, collecting valuable cargo while desperately avoiding the nightmarish duo, Mickey and Minnie.
